sections.heading: Special Containment Procedures
body: SCP-0000 is to be conceptually isolated from Foundation ontological frameworks.
No attempts to redefine SCP-0000 as an instance of any known classification system are permitted.

sections.heading: Description
body: SCP-0000 is a meta-anomalous phenomenon involving the categorization of abstract entities.
SCP-0000 demonstrates resistance to conventional containment paradigms.

sections.heading: Addendum 0000-1
body: Further analysis pending approval from O5 Command.
